name: TRITRIS ORANGE
description:
Goel's TRITRIS, but ORANGE?
(it's the yellow blocks. they're orange now)

controls:
X / C to ROTATE
LSHIFT to HOLD
LEFT / RIGHT to MOVE
UP to HARD DROP (INSTANT DROP)
DOWN to MAKE THE BLOCK FALL FASTER

(thanks to folks at the Tritris discord for playtesting (especially Jelly)! and SirMilkman and Corey Hardt for ideas on Juice!)
